author: Vertyco
description: The successor to EconomyTrack, Metrics is a powerful cog for tracking and visualizing server statistics over time, including economy data and member activity.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
install_msg: Thank you for installing Metrics! Use `[p]help Metrics` to get started.
short: Track and visualize server statistics over time.
